# External Dependencies

This directory is intended to contain the external dependencies (git submodules) needed for this project.
Please follow the project's instructions to initialize these external dependencies.

## Soft DTW for PyTorch in CUDA
Fast CUDA implementation of soft-DTW for PyTorch.
Please see https://github.com/Maghoumi/pytorch-softdtw-cuda for more details.


## JitGRU: GRU with PyTorch's TorchScript
A simple implementation of GRUs using PyTorch's JIT (TorchScript).
Please see https://github.com/Maghoumi/JitGRU for more details.
